name: Captain Flat Earth
description:
Become Captain flat earth and gather evidence to prove, once and for all, that the earth is flat. But beware, there are those who would try to stop you. Armed with the mighty shield of Parallax, you must strike them down and complete your quest.

  • Single player 2D Flatformer
  • PC
  • 3 levels
  • Keyboard and mouse recommended, but also works with an Xbox controller

CONTROLS

Keyboard & mouse:

  • Movement – A/D
  • Jump – Space
  • Interact – F
  • Shoot shield – Left Mouse Button
  • Block with shield – Right Mouse Button
  • Enter toilet – W/S
  • Move camera - Q/E
  • Pause – ESC

Xbox controller:

  • Movement – LS
  • Jump – A/LT
  • Interact – X
  • Shoot shield – RT
  • Block with shield – RS
  • Enter toilet – LS Up/Down
  • Camera position - RB/LB
  • Move camera - RT/LT
  • Pause – Start
